name: Ping (itch) (HJP Ink)
description:
A version with better graphics of the famous arcade Pong game, I made this game a long time ago, and a few weeks ago I remembered that it was incomplete, so I started working on it, now it's finally finished.

Controls:

Player 1 (Left Paddle):

W - Move Up

S - Move down

Player 2 (Right Paddle):

Up Arrow - Move Up

Down Arrow - Move Down

To exit, press the X button at the top or press Escape.
